Package index

Alluvial data

Illustrate, test for, and convert between alluvial formats

is_lodes_form() is_alluvia_form() to_lodes_form() to_alluvia_form()
Check for alluvial structure and convert between alluvial formats
self_adjoin()
Adjoin a dataset to itself
vaccinations
Influenza vaccination survey responses
majors
Students' declared majors across several semesters

Plot layers

Add alluvial layers to ggplots

stat_stratum()
Stratum positions
stat_alluvium()
Alluvial positions
stat_flow()
Flow positions
lode_zigzag() lode_zagzig() lode_forward() lode_rightward() lode_backward() lode_leftward() lode_frontback() lode_rightleft() lode_backfront() lode_leftright()
Lode guidance functions
geom_stratum()
Strata at axes
geom_alluvium() data_to_alluvium()
Alluvia across strata
geom_lode()
Lodes at intersections of alluvia and strata
geom_flow() positions_to_flow()
Flows between lodes or strata
